GSD.product_version: versions from v3.12 to before v5.4.223
GSD.description:
drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.223 by commit ed7f1ff87a4afea1bc220d2ff00a7ce8e61f0b53, it was introduced in version v3.12 by commit a3376e3ec81c5dd0622cbc187db76d2824d31c1c. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges
OSV.details:
drm/msm/hdmi: fix memory corruption with too many bridges
